isis.stitle: TSI 96-16-03 - Heavy Duty Wiper Motor and Linkage, Code SE0016WGJ

subjectgroup.subject: Heavy Duty Wiper Motor and Linkage, Code SE0016WGJ

geninfo.para: Vehicles listed above used in severe service, such as snowplow operation, may require a heavier duty windshield wiper motor and linkage than was ordered initially. Navistar now has available heavy duty linkage, P/N 2042267C91 and a heavy duty wiper motor, P/N 2042266C91, for severe service applications on the above listed vehicles.
The heavy duty motor and linkage mount the same as the original ( Figure 1). For additional service information, refer to CTS-5130S in Group 16, CAB in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual.
